official_title: SUCCEED: Engaging Black Men in Colorectal Cancer Screening (CRC) Screening
inclusion_criteria:
* Adult men
* Identify as Black or African American
* Work or live in Petersburg, VA or surrounding counties
* Eligible for colorectal cancer (CRC) screening at time of study enrollment
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be MALE
Must have minimum age of 45 Years
Must have maximum age of 74 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Inability to speak or read English
* Currently up-to-date with CRC screening
